text:
eonatal Mortality Rate
Number of births that result in a predischarge neonatal 
death (usually within the first 24 hours) in health 
facilities per 1,000 live births in health facilities 
All 
facilities 8.4 8.1 -4% NS
CEmONC = Comprehensive Emergency Obstetric and Newborn Care, EmONC = Emergency Obstetric and Newborn Care. 
1. Definitions are from World Health Organization resources, including Monitoring Emergency Obstetric Care: A Handbook.
2. Percentage change calculations are based on unroun
